alert.note: Alert for Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 05 at 8:52PM CDT until May 05 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL HAYES COUNTY... At 852 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hayes Center, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Hayes Center around 855 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Marengo and Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
